name: Hentai - Soundtrack Of The Year (SOTY)
detailed_description:
Chef Boris - Filthy Hash Brown

Chef Boris makes his tribute in this game with the amazing music titled "Filthy Hash Brown"
Get your hands now on this amazing soundtrack and swing through life like a hoolahoop.

To check out the soundtrack: right click the game Hentai in Steam > Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files > Open the mp3 file.

To download the amazing tune in the main game, go here:
https://opengameart.org/content/night-escape
(No need to buy this DLC to get this music file)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Pentium IV 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9-compatible graphics adapter with 128 MB
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®9-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Pentium IV 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9-compatible graphics adapter with 128 MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®9-compatible
